iti97:2.1: “Kalyanasilo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyanadhammo kalyanapanno imasmim dhammavinaye ‘kevali vusitava uttamapuriso’ti vuccati—
iti97:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati, acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
iti97:3.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyanasilo hoti.
iti97:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sattannam bodhipakkhiyanam dhammanam bhavananuyogamanuyutto viharati.
iti97:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyanadhammo hoti.
iti97:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
iti97:5.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyanapanno hoti.
iti97:6.1: Iti kalyanasilo kalyanadhammo kalyanapanno imasmim dhammavinaye ‘kevali vusitava uttamapuriso’ti vuccati”ti.
iti97:11.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
